orto.net
クラス Base64

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--orto.net.Base64
public class Base64
extends java.lang.Object

Encoder and decoder of Base64.

メソッドの概要
static byte[] decode(java.lang.String text)
          Decode a string and convert to a byte array.
static java.lang.String encode(byte[] data)
          Encode a byte array and convert to a string.
